title: Gofore Oyj
description: Working as a consultant in both big public sector projects and smaller private projects, onspot and with international teams remotely. Built and architected etsin.fairdata.fi application frontend as the only frontend developer and designed an accessible UI. Worked as the first-line service desk engineer for kemira.com solving problems with react, graphql, headless wordpress, azure cloud and added new features based on customer needs. Implemented public site usage reports and data visualizations to avoindata.fi to make it comply with EU regulations and added admin dashboards for approving, editing and deleting organizations and datasets.

title: Self employed
description: Designed and built websites with wordpress for small companies and entrepreneurs. Customized wordpress themes with PHP, CSS and Javascript and set up servers and domains for customers. In addition to programming also did wedding photography.
